about_the_game:
The Across the Grooves Original Soundtrack features more than 50 minutes of music and songs created exclusively for the game.

MP3-format files will be placed in your Across the Grooves folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\Across the Grooves\Soundtrack

Personnel:


Christelle Canot — Vocals,
Charles-Henry Martin — Piano,
Lili Richard-Gautier — Cello,
Camille Marcos — Acoustic Guitars, Electric Guitars, Electric Bass, Percussions, Backing Vocals,
Julien Ponsoda — Keyboards, Strings, Brass and Drums Programming, Percussions, Backing Vocals.

The Across the Grooves Original Soundtrack was composed and arranged by Camille Marcos and Julien Ponsoda (Illustrason).
All lyrics were written by Geoffroy Vincens.

The album was recorded, mixed, and mastered by Illustrason in Bordeaux in 2019 and 2020, and published by Nova-box.

Additional Music:



Down to the Ground by The Neo Tabou Project

Written, composed and arranged by Geoffroy Vincens.
Geoffroy Vincens — Vocals, Acoustic & Electric Guitar, Acoustic Bass, Glockenspiel.
Maude Lamy de La Chapelle — Vocals.

Chaos by Asunder

Written by Geoffroy Vincens, composed by Jacques Malinvaud and arranged by Jacques Malinvaud & Geoffroy Vincens.
Geoffroy Vincens — Vocals, Electric Guitars, Cymbals.
Jacques Malinvaud — Fretless Bass, Electric Guitars, Sound Effects and Drums Programming.
